text: @narendramodi Sir, This Lockdown and COVID-19 exposed what the real India is? This shows us that how big is the labor class in India. Kitne MAJDOOR and MAJBOOR log hai India mei .Forgot about DIGITAL INDIA, GLOBAL INDIA. Do something for majdoor and majboor log , this is the real India.
